tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reports_dashboards (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name TEXT,
    report_type TEXT,
    dashboard_id UUID,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SalesMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sales_amount FLOAT,
    sales_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceIndicators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    performance_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CustomReports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    report_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    revenue DECIMAL
);
